str2: And, both. A primary particle of connection or addition; both or also.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A leader, guide; met: an instructor, teacher. From hodos and hegeomai; a conductor (teacher).
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.
Light, a source of light, radiance. From an obsolete phao; luminousness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Darkness, either physical or moral. From the base of skia; shadiness, i.e. Obscurity.
